Seamless User Experience with Funtouch Android OS 13
With the Funtouch Android OS 13 Global Operating System, the vivo V29 smartphone offers a seamless and intuitive user experience. Stay updated with the latest features and enjoy a smooth interface that adapts to your needs. Navigate effortlessly and make the most out of your device. 
Capture Memories in Stunning Detail
This smartphone's camera setup is a photography enthusiast's dream. The 50 MP OIS + 8 MP wide-angle + 2 MP bokeh Rear Camera and the 50MP Front Camera ensure that every shot is a work of art. From wide landscapes to detailed portraits, your photos will be nothing short of spectacular.
Powerhouse Performance and Storage
Boasting 8GB of RAM, 128GB of ROM, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 778G Processor with 8 Cores, the vivo V29 smartphone is designed to handle anything you throw at it. Run multiple apps, play games, and store your digital world effortlessly. Experience swift, responsive performance every time.
Rapid Charge, Long Play
With a 4600mAh battery and 80W Fast Charging, the vivo V29 ensures you're always ready to go. Charge from 1 to 50% in just 18 minutes, allowing you to stay connected without long pauses. Say goodbye to charging hassles and hello to uninterrupted usage.
Immersive Visuals on a Curved AMOLED Display
Experience visuals like never before on the 6.78-inch Multi-Touch AMOLED Ultra Slim 3D Curved Display. With a resolution of  2800 × 1260 resolution, colors pop, and details come to life. Whether you're gaming or binge-watching, the display ensures an immersive visual experience.
Style Meets Connectivity with 5G Support
This smartphone not only offers top-notch performance but also flaunts an aesthetic design. Plus, with 5G connectivity, you'll enjoy lightning-fast speeds for seamless browsing and streaming. Stay connected, and stay stylish, with the vivo V29.

descriptor.long_desc:
SAMSUNG A34 has Quick and Agile Performance
Equipped with a powerful 2.6GHz MediaTek Dimensity 1080 octa-core processor and ample 8GB RAM, this 5G smartphone enables seamless multitasking and a lag-free experience.
Incredible Camera System

Outfitted with a triple camera system, which includes a 48MP rear camera, 8MP rear camera, 5MP rear camera, and a 13MP front camera, this smartphone offers high photo quality in various shooting scenarios. With this phone, you can ensure that you never miss a moment at your loved ones' special occasions, taking candid shots of the smiles and laughter shared during the celebration.


Capture Clear Moments in Motion

This smartphone's UHD 4K recording capability ensures that your home movies get a professional and cinematic quality. With the Samsung Galaxy A34 5G's VDIS feature, your cherished moments are preserved in stunning clarity and vibrant colours, even when things get a bit shaky. The camera intuitively adapts to changing lighting and framing conditions, ensuring every shot is perfect, thanks to Auto Framing.


Sharp Night Photography

You can take sharp and blur-free nighttime photos, even in challenging low-light environments, using Nightography. The No Shake Cam ensures steady and detailed images and videos, highlighting the phone's advanced technology and innovative design.


Large Space

Featuring 128GB of storage, this device ensures that you have enough space for downloading and storing apps, music, videos, photos, and more. Plus, if you ever need more storage, you can expand it by up to 1TB.


Uninterrupted Power.  Equipped with a robust 5000mAh lithium-ion battery, this smartphone is your steadfast companion for all-day adventures and prolonged outings where charging opportunities may be scarce.

The watch has customisable watch faces with a resolution of 240 by 286 pixels. It has an IP67 rating, making it both water and dustproof. On the right side of the device is a button. The PLAYFIT Dial 3 comes with a blood pressure monitor, heart rate monitor, SpO2 sensor, sleep monitor, female health tracker, and fitness tracker. Along with these functions, the wearable gadget has reminders to keep moving, drink water, and practise breathing techniques. More than 100 sports modes are included with it.A microphone and speaker are integrated into the PLAYFIT Dial 3. It includes Enhanced Bass Extra Loud drivers for a hands-free audio experience, as well as Bluetooth calling. Convenient features on the smartwatch include a notifications display, weather alerts, audio and camera management, and support for Amazon Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant. The battery life is said to last for five days.

descriptor.name: OPPO A18 (4+128) BLACK
descriptor.short_desc:
OPPO A18 Key Features
6.56 inches (16.66 cm), LCD Display, 90Hz
Memory: 4GB RAM, 128GB ROM
Processor: MediaTek Helio G85, Octa Core, 2.0GHz
Camera: 8 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 5 MP Front Camera
Battery: 5000 mAh Battery with 19.35W Fast Charging
USP: Android 13 OS, Side Fingerprint Unlock
descriptor.long_desc:
OPPO A18 smart phone comes with a 90 Hz refresh rate 6.56-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 720x1612 pixels (HD+). Oppo A18 is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Helio G85 processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Oppo A18 runs Android 13 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery.
As far as the cameras are concerned, the Oppo A18 on the rear packs a dual camera setup featuring an 8-megapixel primary camera, and a 2-megapixel camera. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an Unspecified sensor.
The Oppo A18 runs ColorOS 13.1 is based on Android 13 and packs 64GB, 128GB of inbuilt storage. The Oppo A18 is a dual-SIM mobile. The Oppo A18 measures 163.74 x 75.03 x 8.16mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 188.00 grams. It was launched in Glowing Black and Glowing Blue colours.
Connectivity options on the Oppo A18 include Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, Bluetooth v5.30, and USB Type-C. Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, compass/ magnetometer, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
